title: Forecast for the number of new hotel rooms opening in Europe from 2012 to 2016
summary: This statistic shows the new of the hotel rooms in the Europe ( ) from 2012 to 2016 and visualises the predicted 'ageing opening ' _ .
Over the 20 Year period , the hotel rooms is expected to increase by 1.7 years , the largest increase predicted between 2014 and 2015 at 4727 years .
